title: LF platinum duo queue
body: Looking for a duo queue partner to climb to diamond by seasons end for that sexy border - currently plat 4, i main mid and dont have trouble winning lane still want to improve my skills so someone if is smurfing who can give me advice in game on my play would be awesome but anyone who can not feed is welcome ;) can gift skins for helpful people :) thanks

replies.body:
Hey Im currently plat 3 top/mid main
I can sup as well if I have nice adc
If u interest add me IGN: I N
